@Slimpurt
.bin and .cue files are cd mount files which means you use a program like Daemon tools or Alcohol 120% which create a virtual drive inside your computer that shows up as a disk drive. Basically, they mimic you actually putting a disk into a drive on your computer so that you can install the game from the "disk"
Try disabling your cd or dvd drive. That usually needs to be done because of the 2 drives working at the same time.
Nope that didn't work this time. Needs something. maybe prot

Ok,go to Gamecopyworld.com and get the fix for this. Win the RAR file is done downloading extract the exe to your Silent Storm folder and say yes when something pops up asking if you want to replace it. If you download the patch you will have to do this again so don't think it's messed up. The patch just puts in new exe.It works perfect after that. Enjoy a great tactics game. And if your not a patient person then don't download torrets! And dont' play tactics games!

How run game?

Okay follow these steps and the game should run (atleast it did for me):

- Mount the .bin files with PowerISO (don't think Daemon tools will work, I didn't try it though).

- Install the game as normal.

- Download game cracks (ENLISH - FIXED EXE) from Gamecopyworld (http://www.gamecopyworld.com/) 

You'll notice there are 2 crack files available on Gamecopyworld, one is v1.0, that's the one for the non-patched version of the game. If you want to patch the game, then download the patch and then download crack v1.2 to run the game. (The game will not run with  crack v1.0 after you have patched it, you will need crack v1.2 to make it run successfully!)

Btw, the patch can be downloaded from:

http://www.gamershell.com/download_4633.shtml

Hope this helps anyone having troubles in running the game. :)

tnx for game.
and just follow these steps if you have some problems with error about graphic card (for win 7)... sry for bad english

1. Click the start button and type "msconfig" in the run/search box. 
2. Click on the "boot" tab. 
3. Select the default boot setting (selected by default). 
4. Click the "advanced options" button. 
5. Check "maximum memory" and enter something below 4096. (3096 for example). 
6. Click "ok" and click "ok" again. 
7. Reboot your computer. 

Please be aware this does affect your entire OS. When you are not playing Silent Storm go back and uncheck the "maximum memory" setting.
